_comments.aseprite_path: REQUIRED: Path to Aseprite executable. Use /pixel-setup to configure automatically.
_comments.temp_dir: Optional: Temporary directory for MCP operations. Defaults to system temp if empty.
_comments.timeout: Optional: Command timeout in seconds. Default: 30.
_comments.log_level: Optional: Logging verbosity (debug, info, warn, error). Default: info.
_comments.log_file: Optional: Path to log file. Leave empty for no file logging.
_comments.enable_timing: Optional: Log operation timings for performance analysis. Default: false.
